subject: Mental Health
title: Ketamine: A New Frontier
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Ketamine: A New Frontier.

hook.text: A party drug from the 1960s is now one of psychiatry's most exciting breakthroughs.

buildup.text: Ketamine can lift severe depression within hours, not weeks like traditional drugs.

discovery.text: It works on glutamate, a different brain chemical than what SSRIs target.

twist.text: Esketamine, a nasal spray version, was FDA-approved in 2019 for resistant depression.

climax.text: The rapid effect is crucial for patients in immediate danger of self-harm.

punchline.text: Hours instead of weeks can be the difference that matters.

quiz.question: How quickly can ketamine relieve depressive symptoms?
